evidence_extraction:
[
  "The American people are outraged at what's going on, and the American people are saying loud and clear, 'We will not accept an oligarchic form of society. We will not accept the richest guy in the world running all over Washington, making cuts to the Social Security Administration, cuts to the Veterans Administration, almost destroying the Department of Education, all so that they could give over a trillion dollars in tax breaks to the wealthiest 1%.'",
  "These guys, I want to tell you something because I bump into them in my line of work, they are not nice guys.",
  "Trump has a government of the billionaires, by the billionaires, and for the billionaires.",
  "The American people are outraged at what's going on, and the American people are saying loud and clear, 'We will not accept an oligarchic form of society.'",
  "But you would think that if you had a few billion dollars or $10 or $20 billion, you would not feel obliged to step on the backs of poor people to become even richer.",
  "I have every reason to believe deeply in my heart that not only will we defeat Trumpism, but we can create the kind of nation that we deserve.",
  "These guys, I want to tell you something because I bump into them in my line of work, they are not nice guys. I know on TV they come across... And in your community, they make a donation to the hospital or the Boys & Girls Clubs or the food shelf. They're just very nice. But they're not.",
  "But I will tell you this, in the midst of all of these addictions, the worst and most dangerous addiction we have is the greed of the oligarchs.",
  "They are prepared to destroy Social Security, Medicaid, Medicare, the Veterans Administration in order to make themselves even richer.",
  "Today you have more concentration of ownership in America than we have ever had in the history of this country in sector after sector, whether it is agriculture, transportation, media, financial services, what you have is a small number of extraordinarily large corporations who charge us outrageous prices for the products that we have to buy.",
  "I think we lost a hundred thousand Americans last year because of drug overdose.",
  "real inflation accounted for wages today are lower than they were 52 years ago. Meanwhile, there has been a $75 trillion transfer of wealth from the bottom 90% to the top 1%.",
  "The American people are outraged at what's going on, and the American people are saying loud and clear, 'We will not accept an oligarchic form of society.'",
  "Today you've got three Wall Street firms, BlackRock, Vanguard, and State Street. Combined, these three investment firms are the majority stockholders in 95% of American corporations. These guys... they are not nice guys.",
  "You know why the American people are angry and they are angry all over this country? ... That is what a rigged economy is about, and that is what we are going to change.",
  "'We will not accept an oligarchic form of society.'",
  "They are prepared to destroy Social Security, Medicaid, Medicare, the Veterans Administration in order to make themselves even richer.",
  "Abraham Lincoln talked about a government of the people, by the people, for the people. Well, Trump has a government of the billionaires, by the billionaires, and for the billionaires.",
  "The American people are outraged at what's going on, and the American people are saying loud and clear, 'We will not accept an oligarchic form of society. We will not accept the richest guy in the world running all over Washington, making cuts to the Social Security Administration, cuts to the Veterans Administration, almost destroying the Department of Education, all so that they could give over a trillion dollars in tax breaks to the wealthiest 1%.'",
  "I think we lost a hundred thousand Americans last year because of drug overdose.",
  "the worst and most dangerous addiction we have is the greed of the oligarchs.",
  "That is what a rigged economy is about, and that is what we are going to change.",
  "I don't have a PhD in mathematics, but I do know this, that 99% is a hell of a lot larger number than 1%. So if we stand together, are strong, are disciplined, are smart, I have every reason to believe deeply in my heart that not only will we defeat Trumpism, but we can create the kind of nation that we deserve.",
  "So if we stand together, are strong, are disciplined, are smart, I have every reason to believe deeply in my heart that not only will we defeat Trumpism, but we can create the kind of nation that we deserve.",
  "Today you have more concentration of ownership in America than we have ever had in the history of this country in sector after sector, whether it is agriculture, transportation, media, financial services...",
  "real inflation accounted for wages today are lower than they were 52 years ago. Meanwhile, there has been a $75 trillion transfer of wealth from the bottom 90% to the top 1%. That is what a rigged economy is about...",
  "99% is a hell of a lot larger number than 1%. So if we stand together, are strong, are disciplined, are smart, I have every reason to believe deeply in my heart that not only will we defeat Trumpism, but we can create the kind of nation that we deserve."
]
